description: This file contains a test case for the React component 'App' using the Testing Library. It verifies that the 'learn react' text is rendered within the component.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React component element into the virtual DOM for testing.

methods.name: screen.getByText
methods.description: Queries the virtual DOM for an element with specific text content.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Creates an assertion for test verification.

methods.name: toBeInTheDocument
methods.description: Matcher that asserts an element is present in the document.
